pr_title: Fix missing object batch send method

timeline.author: arerlend

timeline.message: batch base impl should not be public

timeline.body: Does this get overridden in the subtypes?
timeline.bodyText: Does this get overridden in the subtypes?
timeline.bodyHTML: Does this get overridden in the subtypes?
timeline.author: alzimmermsft

replies.bodyText: Subtype tryAdd() methods call this method, yes.
replies.author: arerlend

timeline.body: This should be an NPE rather than IllegalArgument. https://azure.github.io/azure-sdk/java_implementation.html#java-errors-system-errors
timeline.bodyText: This should be an NPE rather than IllegalArgument. https://azure.github.io/azure-sdk/java_implementation.html#java-errors-system-errors
timeline.bodyHTML: This should be an NPE rather than IllegalArgument. https://azure.github.io/azure-sdk/java_implementation.html#java-errors-system-errors
timeline.author: conniey

timeline.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                 * @throws NullPointerException if {@code batch} is {@code null}.
          
          
            
                 * @throws NullPointerException if {@code objectBatch} is {@code null}.
timeline.bodyHTML:
Suggested change
* @throws NullPointerException if {@code batch} is {@code null}.
* @throws NullPointerException if {@code objectBatch} is {@code null}.
timeline.author: srnagar
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -457,15 +457,40 @@ public String getEventHubName() {
     }
 
     /**
-     * Sends the batch to the associated Event Hub.
+     * Sends the object batch to the associated Event Hub.
      *
-     * @param batch The batch to send to the service.
+     * @param objectBatch The batch to send to the service.
+     * @param <T> object type
+     * @return A {@link Mono} that completes when the batch is pushed to the service.
+     * @throws NullPointerException if {@code batch} is {@code null}.

timeline.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                 * @throws NullPointerException if {@code batch} is {@code null}.
          
          
            
                 * @throws NullPointerException if {@code eventDataBatch} is {@code null}.
timeline.bodyHTML:
Suggested change
* @throws NullPointerException if {@code batch} is {@code null}.
* @throws NullPointerException if {@code eventDataBatch} is {@code null}.
timeline.author: srnagar
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -457,15 +457,40 @@ public String getEventHubName() {
     }
 
     /**
-     * Sends the batch to the associated Event Hub.
+     * Sends the object batch to the associated Event Hub.
      *
-     * @param batch The batch to send to the service.
+     * @param objectBatch The batch to send to the service.
+     * @param <T> object type
+     * @return A {@link Mono} that completes when the batch is pushed to the service.
+     * @throws NullPointerException if {@code batch} is {@code null}.
+     * @see EventHubProducerAsyncClient#createBatch(Class)
+     * @see EventHubProducerAsyncClient#createBatch(Class, CreateBatchOptions)
+     */
+    public <T> Mono<Void> send(ObjectBatch<T> objectBatch) {
+        return this.sendInternal(objectBatch);
+    }
+
+    /**
+     * Sends the event data batch to the associated Event Hub.
+     *
+     * @param eventDataBatch The batch to send to the service.
      * @return A {@link Mono} that completes when the batch is pushed to the service.
      * @throws NullPointerException if {@code batch} is {@code null}.
